name: KYRHIN STREET
description:
KYRHIN STREET is an autobiographical project that shows the different states of my bedroom in different stages of my life, and how it has contributed to molding my art and my practice.

This is the first VR project that I'm actually sharing publicly.

This VR project does not require the use of any headsets and is viewable on your PC, Mac, or Windows computer.

I've only ever lived in one home, so my bedroom is a very sacred space for me that has witnessed a lot.

I hope you enjoy this vulnerable piece of work.
